snippet: Mike Conley had 24 points, lifting the Memphis Grizzlies past the host Los Angeles Lakers. Memphis moved a game ahead of idle Phoenix for the final Western Conference playoff berth.
abstract: Memphis Grizzlies beat Los Angeles Lakers, 102-90; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Conley had 24 points, lifting the Memphis Grizzlies past the host Los Angeles Lakers. Memphis moved a game ahead of idle Phoenix for the final Western Conference playoff berth.
